name: Neelcon Steel Industries
overview:
Neelcon Steel Industries represents a new era in steel manufacturing & Suppling. Neelcon Steel Industries produces steel products of the highest quality, while emphasizing employee safety and care for the environment Test.

Maintaining a safe working environment is our first priority at Neelcon Steel Industries. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re so proud of our safety achievements Our stainless steel products are supplied & accepted by our clients in various sphere of industries ranging from basic industries such as Paper, Textile, Sugar, Dairy, Cement, Engineering to more complex such as Petroleum, Chemicals, Power, Offshore, Onshore & Nuclear Industries.

We deal in Stainless Steel, Carbon Steel, Alloy Steel, Copper Alloys & Exotic Nickel Alloys in form of Pipe, Tube, Stainless Steel Sheets & Plates, Fittings & Stainless Steel Flanges, Stainless Steel Nuts Bolts & Fasteners, Cupro Nickel fittings, valves, Stainless Steel Pipes. We can fulfill Client’s requirement of all size as we stock huge amount of material from both indigenous & foreign manufactures.
